text: MINUTES OF PROCEEDINGS OF THE SITTING OF TUESDAY, 13 NOVEMBER 1979
label: TITLE

text:
IN THE CHAIR: MRS VEIL
President
label: TEXT

text: (The sitting was opened at 10 a.m.)
label: TEXT

text: 1..Approval of minutes
label: SECTION_HEADER

text: Mr de Goede spoke.
label: TEXT

text: The minutes of proceedings of the previous day's sitting were approved.
label: TEXT

text: 2. Agenda
label: SECTION_HEADER

text: — Proposal from the Commission for a Regulation amending the Staff Regulations of officials of the Communities (Doc. 202/79)
label: TEXT

text: Mr Lange gave the opinion of the Committee on Budgets, the committee responsible.
label: TEXT

text: The following spoke: Mr Klepsch, who withdrew on behalf of the Group of the European People's Party (CD Group) the request for urgent debate on the motion for a resolution on summer time (Doc. 1-452/79), and Mr Tugendhat, Member of the Commission.
label: TEXT

text: The President announced to Parliament that the report by Mr Key, on behalf of the Committee on Budgetary Control, on the representation allowances and expenses of members of the Commission, entered as a possible item on the agenda for the sitting of Thursday, 15 November, had been withdrawn since this committee had not been able to meet.
label: TEXT

text: Parliament rejected the request for urgent debate on the Commission's proposal for a Regulation.
label: TEXT

text: 3. Urgent debate
label: SECTION_HEADER

text: — Draft rectifying and supplementary budget No 3 for 1979 (Doc. 1-470/79)
label: TEXT

text: The President announced that she had received from Mr Pedini, on behalf of the Committee on Youth, Culture, Education, Information and Sport, a motion for a resolution, with request for urgent debate pursuant to Rule 14 of the Rules of Procedure, on the meeting of the Council of Education Ministers (Doc. 1-473/79/rev. II).
label: TEXT

text: The following spoke: Mr Lange, who gave the opinion of the Committee on Budgets, the committee responsible, Mr Klepsch, on behalf of the Group of the European People's Party (CD Group), Mr Bangemann, on behalf of the Liberal and Democratic Group, Mr Scott-Hopkins, on behalf of the European Democratic Group, and Mr Lange, Chairman of the Committee on Budgets.
label: TEXT

text: Parliament rejected the request for urgent debate.
label: TEXT

text: She stated that the reasons supporting this request for urgent debate were contained in the document itself.
label: TEXT

text: She announced that, pursuant to Rule 14 (1), second subparagraph, of the Rules of Procedure, the vote on this request would take place at the beginning of the next day's sitting.
label: TEXT

text: 4. Decision on urgency
label: SECTION_HEADER

text: The first item on the agenda was the decision on the urgency of a proposal for a Regulation, draft rectifying and supplementary budget No 3, and two motions for resolutions.
label: TEXT

text: — Motion for a resolution on summer time (Doc. 1-452/79)
label: TEXT

text: The President noted Mr Klepsch's withdrawal of the request for urgent debate.
label: TEXT

text: Pursuant to Rule 25 of the Rules of Procedure, this motion was referred to the appropriate committee, in this case the Committee on Transport; the Political Affairs Committee was asked for an opinion.
label: TEXT

text: — Motion for a resolution on UK immigration controls (Doc. 1-479/79)
label: TEXT
